member.name: SourceInfo
member.summary: Represents information about an object’s XAML source document.

member.name: SourceInfo.FileName
member.summary: The name of the source document file where the element is declared.

member.name: SourceInfo.LineNumber
member.summary: The line number in the source document where the element is declared.

member.name: SourceInfo.ColumnNumber
member.summary: The position on the line in the source document where the element is declared.

member.name: SourceInfo.CharPosition
member.summary: The character position in the source document.

member.name: SourceInfo.Hash
member.summary: The hash of the source document.
